comment: She is a very fair teacher with a very clear grading criteria. You can do a lot of makeup work and she is very lenient on grading if you put in something late.

comment: You get 3 absences, lets you leave class a bit early and she starts it a bit later. Weekly progress reports to let you know how you're doing on the projects throughout the semester that includes valuable feedback. She understands this class might not be the most fun but she really tries to make it enjoyable and help students anyway she can.

I took Professor Meiers for Character Development. I think the course was very informational, building up basics before a full on character design, however prepare for a lot of due dates. If you communicate with her, she is very kind and flexible. Her rubrics are very detailed and lays out everything clearly. SHe qas very understanding with me too!

comment: I took professor Meier for environments for animation and I loved the class. She gives feedback as you update (there are many small deadlines to keep you on track) and the projects feel so professional with her templates. You have plenty of class time to work, and shes a very understanding person. Definitely recommend

Great professor! As long as you read the project requirements and work to fulfill them, you'll probably get an A. She also gives a TON of extra credit opportunities, so you could probably get over a 100 if you put in extra work!
